summary: A teenager's reputation is destroyed when she falls asleep drunk at a party and some boys take provocative photos of her.
cast: Amanda Renberg|Björn Kjellman|Ellen Fjæstad|Linn Persson|Filip Berg|Marcus Hasselborg|Carla Abrahamsen|Björn Davidsson|Robin Lindbom|Manuel Bjelke|Margareta Pettersson|Cattis Olsen|Ulrika Dahllöf|Josephine Bauer|John F. Lindquist|Cecilia Ljung|Douglas Åkerström
keywords: underage drinking|slut shaming|eastern europe|swedish lifestyle|male objectification
title: Hip Hip Hora!
